turns.text: What about you
turns.label: qo

turns.text: We- I end up with an old stand-by that we call Russian chicken because its so easy --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and uh it go- - you have to cook very little to go with it just some rice and some salad and thats about it you know
uh-huh Well what do you put in it
turns.label: b

turns.text: Uh you make you just take your boneless chicken breasts and then you take and make dressing out of uh Russian dressing one bottle of that --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and package of Lipton Onion Soup mix --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and three ounces of apricot preserves --
Ooh that sounds good
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and you mix it up and you just put it on the top of the chicken and then I cover the pan with foil and put it in the oven for about an hour --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and then I take the foil off and let it brown --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- takes about another twenty minutes --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and its delicious --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Ooh that sounds good
turns.label: ba

turns.text: -- and its so simple because I can pop it in when I come in the door you know and then uh go about my business and by the time Ive got everything else ready the chickens re- chickens done
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Is done right
turns.label: b^m

turns.text: So thats real easy thing for me
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah that sounds good too
turns.label: b

turns.label: b

turns.text: -- but inside the cheese cake uh recipe you put um lemon peel and orange peel --

-- and its just enough to taste it you know when when when youre eating the cheese cake and it is wonderful but it takes long time because you have to cook it for forty-five minutes and then you turn the oven off and you leave it in the oven for another forty-five minutes --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Um
-- and then you open up the oven door and leave it in for another forty-five minutes --
Oh my goodness

uh-huh
